page.title: 10HOUSING BEDROOMS
page.content: My bedroom is painted the colour of creamy peach.I like to be different so I move my bed from place to place.I don't like my bedroom to be in a mess but very often it is.My bedroom is upstairs and my curtains are flowery. On one side of the bedroom is a desk. Next to the desk there is a wardrobe. On top of the desk there are two shelves. On one of the shelves I keep books and talc. On the higher shelf I keep little ornaments like dolls from different countries.On my desk I have things like school books and a folder with gym certificates and medals.Most of the time I do my homework on my desk but sometimes I do it on my bed. When I am really tired I do my homework actually in bed.I have a funny habit because when ever my friend is around I always start tidyin up.I also keep things under my desk.
